channel.title: opensource on Ross A. Baker
channel.description: Recent content in opensource on Ross A. Baker

item.description: I just reviewed both the Apache 2 and MIT licenses. Great news: nothing compels us to collaborate with or otherwise support transphobes with our free labor! #OpenSource

There's an underpopulated place in open source right now between the rabidity of the FSF and the foolishness of "join our Discord." Where are the communities that will be relevant in a decade? #OpenSource
